hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select `PROFILE_ID`, `NUMBER`, `NAME`, `USER_ID`, `PASSWORD`, `CURRENT_SCORE`, `LEVEL`, `RLS_PATH`, `ROLE`, `STATUS`, DATE_FORMAT(`CREATE_TIME`, "%Y年%m月%d日%H时%i分%S秒") AS `CREATE_TIME`, `CREATE_BY`, DATE_FORMAT(`UPDATE_TIME`, "%Y年%m月%d日%H时%i分%S秒") AS `UPDATE_TIME`, `UPDATE_BY` from `player_profile` where (`ROLE` = ? or ? IS NULL) and (UPPER(`USER_ID`) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%', ?), '%')) or ? IS NULL) and (`RLS_PATH` LIKE CONCAT(?, '%') or ? IS NULL) order by CASE `ROLE` WHEN 'SuperGameMaster' THEN 'B' WHEN 'GameMaster' THEN 'C' ELSE `ROLE` END, `STATUS`, `CREATE_TIME` desc

SELECT COUNT(*) AS RECORD_COUNT FROM player_profile WHERE (`ROLE` = ? or ? IS NULL) and (UPPER(`USER_ID`) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%', ?), '%')) or ? IS NULL) and (`RLS_PATH` LIKE CONCAT(?, '%') or ? IS NULL)
SELECT player_profile.rls_path FROM player_profile WHERE role = 'GroupUser' or role = 'Administrator'

SELECT player_profile.rls_path FROM player_profile INNER JOIN ( SELECT rls_path FROM player_profile WHERE rls_path = ? ) target ON player_profile.rls_path LIKE CONCAT(target.rls_path, '%') WHERE player_profile.role = 'GroupUser'
select replace(rls_path, concat("!", user_id), "") as path_key, concat("root!", rls_path) as path_value, role from player_profile where role ='GroupUser' or role = 'User' order by rls_path

select cast(x.num as signed) num, cast(x.group_user as char(100)) group_user from (select count(rls_path) num, case when instr(rls_path, "!") > 0 then substr(rls_path, 1, instr(rls_path, "!") - 1) when instr(rls_path, "!") = 0 then rls_path end group_user from player_profile where role ='GroupUser' or role = 'User' group by group_user) x
